sentences.en: a mountainous area with spectacular scenery
Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.cn: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.en: Even his death, after crashing his motorcycle on a bridge in New Orleans, was spectacular.
sentences.cn: 甚至他骑摩托车在新奥尔良撞桥身亡的事也轰动一时。

sentences.en: He gets spectacular goals and is a real crowd pleaser.
sentences.cn: 他有很多精彩进球，是一名真正能给观众带来欢乐的运动员。

sentences.en: I called Andie to tell her how spectacular the stuff looked.
sentences.cn: 我打电话告诉安迪，那东西看上去太棒了。

sentences.en: Its proud successes and its spectacular flops spurred research efforts.
sentences.cn: 它的应用有多少次辉煌的成就,也有不少次显然的失败,这就推动了对它的研究工作.

sentences.en: Its rings were discovered by telescope from Earth, but space probes later found that spectacular rings surround some other planets.
sentences.cn: 它的圆环是从地球上用望远镜发现的，但是太空探测器后来又发现了围绕其他一些星球的壮观的圆环。

sentences.en: The bombing was a spectacular act of sabotage.
sentences.cn: 这场轰炸是一次大规模的蓄意破坏行为。

sentences.en: The ceremonial opening of the exhibition was very spectacular.
sentences.cn: 展览会的开幕式非常壮观.

sentences.en: The fish put up a spectacular 20 minute struggle before being netted.
sentences.cn: 那条鱼在被捕到网里之前整整挣扎了20分钟，真是不可思议。

sentences.en: The house has the most spectacular views imaginable.
sentences.cn: 从这所房子可以看到所能想象的最壮丽的景色。

sentences.en: There was a spectacular sunrise yesterday.
They have revamped the business with spectacular success.
sentences.cn: 他们成功地调整了业务，成绩斐然。
这是一部场面壮观的电影.

sentences.en: This is the most spectacular financial crash of the decade.
sentences.cn: 这是10年里最引人注目的金融破产事件.

trans.tran_cn: 场面富丽的，壮观的，引人注意的，惊动一时的，惊人的
壮观的场面，精彩的表演，〈美〉一小时半以上的大场面电视节目，特大霓虹灯广告
trans.tran_en: an event or performance that is very large and impressive
